thread.title: This photo is why Rosie O'Donnell absolutely has to play Steve Bannon on 'SNL'
thread.title_full: This photo is why Rosie O'Donnell absolutely has to play Steve Bannon on 'SNL'

author: Keith Wagstaff
title: This photo is why Rosie O'Donnell absolutely has to play Steve Bannon on 'SNL'
text:
This photo is why Rosie O'Donnell absolutely has to play Steve Bannon on 'SNL' 36 2017-02-10 03:48:53 UTC 
Donald Trump haaates Rosie O'Donnell. He also isn't a fan of women portraying men on his staff . 
So chances are he's not going to like O'Donnell's new Twitter profile pic. Yes, that's Trump's nemesis as Stephen Bannon. 
Image: Rosie O'DOnnell/Twitter SEE ALSO: The internet wants Rosie O'Donnell to play Steve Bannon on 'SNL'...and she's into it 
Earlier this week, Politico reported that Trump didn't like Melissa McCarthy's impression of White House Press Secretary Sean Spicer on Saturday Night Live — not due to the content of the sketch, but because he didn't like that he was played by a woman. 
Someone suggest O'Donnell play Bannon, Trump's chief strategist. And so, she volunteered for service. available - if called i will serve !!! https://t.co/LT84EJjfsw 
After seeing the new profile photo, famous and not-so-famous users on Twitter demanded the SNL casting happen. 
Just look: 
— Patton Oswalt (@pattonoswalt) February 10, 2017 Oh, a thousand times, yes. If there is a God, please let this happen. @Rosie @nbcsnl pic.twitter.com/X1YrzRpIv1 
— George Takei (@GeorgeTakei) February 10, 2017 Oh please please PLEASE @Rosie & @nbcsnl tell me it's true. pic.twitter.com/0AyGNWkDJU
